attributes.additional_details: Noting the Prime Minister’s recent call in a speech marking the 400th Anniversary of the King James Bible to “stand up and defend” the values and morals from it that have shaped the UK, we the undersigned call on the House of Commons to consider the matter of Christian persecution around the world; call on the Government to take action against those Governments that either perpetrate acts of persecution against Christians or fail to protect Christians against persecution and call on the Foreign and Commonwealth Office to publish an annual report on Religious Freedom around the world.
